result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bradley Eugene Mitchell

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Adjourned initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

2:08 PM Defendant Bradley Eugene Mitchell appeared by video.  Attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Ginocchio states this is not a victim witness case. Defendant is to contact the public defenders office.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 12, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

9:01 AM Defendant Bradley Eugene Mitchell in court in person.  Attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio in court in person for State of Wisconsin. Court takes no action on this matter today.  This is not his case.  Matter remanded back to the Commissioner for scheduling. Court advises victim BC to contact the Victim Witness Office to have no contact order vacated.

10:05 AM Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio  and intern Verity Altenberger appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Bradley Eugene Mitchell in court. Address verified, Date of Birth verified. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Court orders no bond set continue to follow restraining order
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Initial appearance on July 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
